colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B ZHES KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD PA PHUL DU BYUNG BA MER GEN CHOS RJE BEG 'DUN BZANG POS CUNG ZAD RGYAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, PAN CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS MDZAD PA'I KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I KE LA SHA LA GZHIR BZHAGS CING, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I KLU GTOR BDUD RTZI'I 'O MA'I CHU RGYUN GYIS ZUR BRGYAN NAS RANG GI GANG DPOG KYI LEGS CHAS KYANG BRGYAN TE, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MAnI PRADZNY'AS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA GU SHR'I CHOS RJE KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, 'GRO BA KUN GYI NANG GDON SDIG SGRIB THAMS CAD BYANG ZHING DAG NAS SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
